## Learning Outcome

By the end of this session, you will be able to:

- Gain better understanding from massive dataset using Interactive Data Exploration and Analysis (IDEA) approach.
- Perform interactive data exploration and analysis by using appropriate analysis functions of SAS Visual Analytics.
- Detect the expected and discover the unexpected patterns from real world data using IDEA approach.
